mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alarm (alarm_id, location_id, alarm_type, rescue_type, alarm_power, alarm_time, is_call ) VALUES ( #{alarmId}, #{locationId}, #{alarmType}, #{rescueType}, #{alarmPower}, #{alarmTime}, #{isCall} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.alarm_id as alarmId from alarm a,device d,location l WHERE a.location_id=l.location_id and l.device_id=d.device_id and a.is_call=1 and d.imei_code=#{deviceIMEI}
mapper.update: UPDATE alarm a SET a.is_call=2 WHERE a.alarm_id=#{alarmId}
mapper.select: SELECT d.device_id as deviceId, d.imei_code as deviceIMEI, l.latitude as latitude, l.longitude as longitude, a.alarm_id as alarmId, a.is_call as isCall, a.alarm_time as alarmTime FROM device d,location l,alarm a WHERE d.device_id=l.device_id AND l.location_id=a.location_id AND (a.is_call=1 OR a.is_call=2)
